name: career-fair-prep
description: Students planning for the engineering career fair and resume review night

events.content: Is there anything happening this week to get ready for the career fair? I’m freaking out about my resume.
ACM’s doing the resume review night again on Wednesday at 6pm in 14-252. They usually bring alumni too.
Nice! Do we just show up or is there a signup?
Hey all! RSVP on MustangJOBS so we can match reviewers faster. Search for "ACM Resume Review Night" and claim a slot. Walk-ins are welcome but you might wait.
Also swing by the career center drop-ins in 02-107. They’re doing rapid resume checks all week.
Legend. I’ll register tonight and try for a drop-in tomorrow.
Bring 3 printed copies and dress business casual. See you there!
